catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Chef Line Knife Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: Seven piece precision stainless steel knife set for the demanding chef.
catentdesc.longdescription: This seven piece kitchen cutting set consists of six knives, a steel, and a polished steel butcher's block. The blades are superbly crafted for balance while the brushed-steel handles are ergonomically designed for comfort. This precision knife set is perfect for the food expert.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Sous Chef Line Knife Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: Five piece knife set to meet all your food preparation needs.
catentdesc.longdescription: This five piece kitchen cutting set consists of four knives, kitchen scissors, and a wooden butcher's block. The blades are superbly crafted for balance making this set perfect for the budding chef.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Knife Starter Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: Three piece knife set for all your food preparation needs.
catentdesc.longdescription: Consisting of a small, medium, and large bladed knives, this versatile three piece stainless steel knife set will be all you need as you take on any cooking project! These knives are crafted for durability and are dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: Cuisine Warmth Oven Mitt
catentdesc.longdescription: The Cuisine Warmth over mitt is the only oven mitt you'll need; it is long enough to protect your forearm from oven heat and the quilted cotton effectively grips all types of pans and oven glassware.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Stainless Steel Utensil Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: An eight piece set of stainless steel kitchen utensils.
catentdesc.longdescription: With a sleek, modern design, this set of stainless steel kitchen utensils includes everything you need to help you prepare, cook and serve your meals.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Birch Cutting Board
catentdesc.shortdescription: Solid birch hard wood cutting board.
catentdesc.longdescription: This cutting board is made from a single piece of birch. Since there are no glued pieces, it is our most durable cutting board and stands up extremely well in all food preparation.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Bamboo Cutting Board
catentdesc.longdescription: This durable bamboo cutting board is easy on knife blades, and is also more eco-friendly than non-bamboo cutting boards as bamboo grows much quicker than other types of wood. This cutting board is perfect for vegetable cutting as well as for preparing sushi.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Cherry Cutting Board
catentdesc.longdescription: This beautiful cutting board is made from cherry; one of the hardest hard woods available. Due to cherry's ultra fine-grained hardness, this cutting board is perfect to use when cutting meat, poultry, and fish.

catentdesc.name: Cuisine Warmth Pot Holder
catentdesc.shortdescription: Small checker patterned cotton pot holder.
catentdesc.longdescription: Part of the Cuisine Warmth Heritage line, the classic red checkered pattern evokes down home cooking and will add a touch of warmth to any kitchen.

catentdesc.name: Cuisine Warmth Pot Holder
catentdesc.shortdescription: Large checker patterned cotton pot holder.
catentdesc.longdescription: Part of the Cuisine Warmth Heritage line, the bold red checkered pattern is a modern twist on the classic red checkered pattern.

catentdesc.name: Cuisine Warmth Oven Mitt
catentdesc.longdescription: The Cuisine Warmth over mitt is the only oven mitt you'll need; it is long enough to protect your forearm from oven heat and the quilted cotton effectively grips all types of pans and oven glassware.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Sous Chef Line Eight Piece Cooking Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: Eight piece stainless steel pots and pan cooking set.
catentdesc.longdescription: This eight piece cooking set consists of three medium-sized pots, a large, deep dish frying pan, and lids. The molded plastic handles always stay cool to the touch and the stainless steel set is easy to clean and maintain.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Heritage Croc Pot
catentdesc.shortdescription: Enamel-coated ceramic croc pot for sauces and small roasts.
catentdesc.longdescription: The KitchenCraft ceramic croc pot is a thick-bottomed pot that is perfect for slow cooking your sauces or roasts. Thicker bottomed, kiln-fired ceramic pots like this one are ideal for dishes that require a long simmering time as ceramic is ideal for very even heat distribution without burning.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Chef Line Six Piece Cooking Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: Six piece stainless steel cooking set.
catentdesc.longdescription: This six piece cooking set consists of a small, medium, and large pot with lids. The stainless steel handles always stay cool to the touch and the stainless steel set is easy to clean and maintain.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Wooden Utensil Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: A six piece set of wooden kitchen utensils.
catentdesc.longdescription: Aside from providing your kitchen with warmth, wooden utensils also prolong the life of your stainless steel pots by not scratching them. Made from oak for strength and durability, these wooden utensils are a stunning addition to any kitchen.

catentdesc.name: KitchenCraft Cookie Jar
catentdesc.longdescription: This easy to clean glass cookie jar can hold approximately two dozen medium-sized cookies The slanted lid makes it easier to access the goodies inside! Dishwasher safe.
